archiefmat.scope:
In the agenda for each day all the letters and papers that were received were listed, stating the name of the sender, date and number of the document sent, short contents, and finally the number that it received after it was considered and ready to be put in the archive. This number corresponds with the number in the protocol of resolutions. Besides all the documents received a consecutive number according to the order in which it was registered; each day the first document registered received the number '1.'

From the agenda a good impression can be obtained from the variety of subjects on which information can be found in the protocols of resolutions.
archiefmat.notes:
The complete series up to 1947 consists of 345 volumes.

The numbers of the inventory items may be changed (November 2008).
archiefmat.Aantekeningen: NB de nummering kan mogelijk nog wijzigen; het archief wordt op dit moment (november 2008) omgenummerd. Later nazien!
